thread.title: David Beckham enjoys day out with the kids as Victoria works hard for New York Fashion Week
thread.title_full: David Beckham enjoys day out with the kids as Victoria works hard for New York Fashion Week

author: Vicki Newman
title: David Beckham enjoys day out with the kids as Victoria works hard for New York Fashion Week
text:
David Beckham enjoys day out with the kids as Victoria works hard for New York Fashion Week The family is getting on with life as normal amid the hacked emails scandal Share David Beckham enjoys a day out with the kids as Victoria heads to the office in New York (Photo: Copyright unknown) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
David Beckham made the most of being in New York by enjoying a day out with the kids as wife Victoria headed to the office. 
The Spice Girl turned fashion designer is hard at work for New York Fashion Week and the rest of the Beckhams wrapped up warm to head out in the snow-hit city. 
The famous family are getting on with life as normal amid the hacked email scandal which put their brand at risk. 
David looked the doting dad as he walked down the street holding Harper's hand. Read More David Beckham still deserves a knighthood, says Dame Jessica Ennis-Hill David holds Harper's hand as they walk around New York (Photo: Rex Features) 
Looking snazzy in a pair of jeans, white trainers and a brown leather jacket, complete with long scarf and cap, David held on tightly to his youngest child. 
Harper, five, looked adorable in a navy blue coat and matching hat with a pink bobble on top. 
Romeo, 14, and Cruz, 11, were along for the day as well, and both wrapped up warm in puffy jackets and beanies. 
The Beckhams' eldest son Brooklyn, 17, appears to have been off doing his own thing as his younger siblings enjoyed some time with dad. Romeo and Cruz headed out with dad too (Photo: Rex Features) David is getting on with life as normal amid the emails scandal (Photo: Rex Features) 
They were pictured out and about in New York on Saturday and we can only imagine all the fun things they got up to. 
But for Victoria, the trip was all business. 
She was seen leaving her hotel and heading to the office to get some work done for New York Fashion Week. Read More What fun things did they get up to? (Photo: Rex Features) It was a business trip for Victoria (Photo: Splash News) 
The designer looked super stylish in a pair or black wide-leg trousers and a khaki green polo neck jumper, with the sleeves rolled up to just below her elbows. 
She completed her look with a designer bag tucked under her left arm and hid her eyes behind a pair of large sunglasses. 
She was only walking from the front door of the hotel to a waiting car, but still, she must have felt the cold after she chose not to wear a coat. 
It's been a tough time for the Beckhams lately, after emails of the footballing ace allegedly moaning about not being handed a knighthood were hacked and leaked. Victoria headed to the office to work for New York Fashion Week (Photo: Splash News) Wasn't she cold without a coat? (Photo: Splash News) 
In one, Becks allegedly branded the honours committee “unappreciative c***s” after he missed out on a knighthood. 
In another, referring to the 2014 New Year Honours OBE for opera star Katherine Jenkins, who had confessed to taking drugs in the past, Becks allegedly said: “For what? Singing at the rugby and going to see the troops plus taking coke. F***ing joke.” 
The hacker who blackmailed David's team by threatening to release the emails is not on the run and fears for his life. 
The cyber criminal has already upset African despots and Russian, Turkish and Kazakh mafias. 
His life is a continuous game of cat-and-mouse in which he must always stay one step ahead of his ruthless enemies. Like us on Facebook
